name: Operative
long_description:
Operative helps organizations build internal applications fast with AI.
We let teams generate fully functional frontends on top of their existing backend APIs. Think of it as Retool, but with direct integration to internal APIs and full internal web app code generation.

After launching a consumer product with strong traction, weâ€™re now focused on serving businesses and enterprises looking to accelerate internal tool development.
one_liner: Web application code generation for internal APIs
